TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlConditions extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件集。

span.span: Represents a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言以及一组在评估 SAML 断言的有效性时必须考虑的条件来指定其声明。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion. 类表示条件集。The class represents the set of conditions. 是否不得缓存 SAML 断言是条件的一个示例，该条件由 类表示。An example of a condition is whether the SAML assertion must not be cached, which is represented by the class. SAML 规范定义了两个条件，并允许扩展条件集。The SAML specification defines two conditions and it allows for the set of conditions to be extended. SAML 规范定义的两个条件是 和 。The two conditions defined by the SAML specification are and . 若要定义新条件，请从 类派生一个类。To define a new condition, derive a class from the class.
